headline: Matt Sexton, director of corporate social responsibility, B&Q
text: Observer Ethical awards 2012 judge Matt Sexton    Matt Sexton was appointed B&Q's Director of Corporate Social Responsibility in 2009 having spent more than 15 years in the world of retail buying with B&Q and other national retailers. The business is committed to becoming more sustainable and won the Observer's Ethical Business Award in 2010 for its continued efforts. Matt believes B&Q's sponsorship of the 'Campaigner of the Year' category is a great fit with the business, having led and supported numerous campaigns to encourage sustainability, including its Forest Friendly campaign  encouraging people to question the source of timber in products.
